name: Material Lead Time
description: This column retrieves the lead time by material and plant, primarily using the "Total Replenishment Lead Time" from the 'MRP 3' tab of the material master. In cases where the replenishment lead time is not available, it uses the "Planned Delivery Time" from the 'MRP 2' tab as an alternative value.

annotations.name: TabularEditor_InPerspective
annotations.value: ["CS Dashboard","Finance","Generic Sales","Goods and Invoice Receipts","Inventory","Open Orders Report","Operations","Planning","Purchase Orders","Sales Orders","Warehouse"]
